page.title: 13A school day (2)
page.content: books, read the Bible, or listen to the teacher talking to us about charities. We have lunch at 1200 hrs. either in the school canteen or the school hall. I bring a packed lunch containing bread rolls with a meat filling and a can of Pepsi drink. After eating, we sit, talk or play with our friends in the playground. We can also buy Ice Creams or Lollipops from the visiting Ice Cream van. At 1300 hrs. the bell calls us to our Form rooms again for registration. This is followed by a History lesson. I like History. The day ends with a Cookery lesson for which we have to bring ingredients and make scones, flans, cakes etc. At 1530 hrs. school ends and we go home to have tea and do our homework exercises.
